name: AI Algorithms
description: This KU covers fundamental algorithms used in artificial intelligence (AI). It includes the study of classical and modern AI algorithms, their applications, and the principles underlying their operation.
outcomes: Define key AI algorithms and their purposes.
Identify different types of AI algorithms, such as rule-based systems, decision trees, and neural networks.
Explain the workings of various AI algorithms.
Describe the strengths and weaknesses of different AI algorithms.
Implement AI algorithms to solve specific problems.
Use programming languages to apply AI algorithms in practical scenarios.
Compare and contrast different AI algorithms.
Analyze the performance of AI algorithms on various datasets.
Assess the suitability of AI algorithms for specific applications.
Evaluate the effectiveness of AI algorithms in solving real-world problems.
Design new AI algorithms to address complex problems.
Develop hybrid algorithms by combining different AI techniques.
topics: Metrics for Algorithm Performance (Accuracy, Precision, Recall, F1-Score)
notes: Special instructions or explanations: Emphasize practical applications and real-world examples., Integrate hands-on activities and projects to apply AI algorithms., Highlight the importance of algorithm evaluation and performance metrics.
